alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Ottawa (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 1:31PM CDT until May 09 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Dickinson County in central Kansas... Southern Ottawa County in north central Kansas... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 130 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Culver, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abilene, Solomon, Bennington, Tescott, Culver and Niles. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 267 and 280. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
